scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
scripts.docker:build: npm run build && npm run test && with-package docker image build . -t pkg.imageRepo:pkg.version && npm run docker:tag
scripts.docker:tag: with-package docker image tag pkg.imageRepo:pkg.version pkg.imageRepo:latest
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:clean && npm run docker:runHelper
scripts.docker:runHelper: with-package docker run -e NODE_ENV=local --name pkg.imageName -d -p pkg.imagePort:3000 pkg.imageRepo
scripts.docker:debug: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run && sleep 1 && with-package open 'http://localhost:pkg.imagePort' && npm run docker:taillogs
scripts.aws:login: AWS_REGION=$(with-package echo 'pkg.awsRegion' | tail -1 | awk '{print $NF}') && eval $(aws ecr get-login --no-include-email --region $AWS_REGION)
scripts.aws:release: with-package docker run --env-file ./.env silintl/ecs-deploy -c pkg.awsEcsCluster -n pkg.awsService -i pkg.imageRepo:latest -r pkg.awsRegion --timeout 1000
scripts.aws:publish: npm run aws:login && npm run docker:publish && npm run aws:release
